function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between urban density and COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Uncertainty in urban planning and policy decisions","Mitigation":"Conduct further research, consider multiple factors influencing pandemic dynamics","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling tools","People":"Urban planners, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Contradictory findings on the influence of urban form and design on pandemic dynamics","Impact":"Confusion in decision-making and urban planning","Mitigation":"Collaborative research, interdisciplinary studies, and continuous monitoring","Technologies":"Interdisciplinary research frameworks, data sharing platforms","People":"Researchers, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Variability in the relationship between population density and COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Inability to predict pandemic dynamics based on urban density alone","Mitigation":"Integrate multiple factors, consider local context and public health measures","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, epidemiological models","People":"Urban planners, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
